item.title: Useful Python packages discovery sites
item.author: Antoine Martin
item.description: Python is an awesome language with an awesome ecosystem. It is both mature and very active. You are rarely left alone when you need to be doing something new. There are always one or more open source libraries or framework to help you achieve your goal. But now you’re left with a dilemma: Which one to choose ? The criteria are fairly simple. You want a library actively used and maintained, with the biggest community possible.
